name: Ships Ahoy!
description:
The year is 1701, You have rebelled against your family to join a pirate crew and explore the ends of the earth in search of adventure. Until one day, you come under attack from another ship, but in the midst of battle, the captain is badly injured by flying debris. Now you must take control of the ship and fight back in order to save the rest of the crew.

Player 1 Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D

Shoot - N, M

TNT Barrel - Space bar

Player 2 Controls:

Move - Numpad 8, Numpad 4, Numpad 5, Numpad 6

Shoot - Left Arrow, Right Arrow

TNT Barrel - Down Arrow

Key Features:

2 Player action

Fast paced

Shooting/TNT traps

Pirate Ships

Randomly generated Islands
